Sinopse: Six years ago Joey's life changed totally. A shop owner who lay in a pool of blood claimed that Joey was the perpetrator. Now the time is served and Joey has scars on both his body and his soul. He is determined to never go back to prison. She is at first sceptical about Joey staying there, but soon they develop a special relationship.—Fredrik Klasson
